<!--- For HTML Only --->


<!-- \require{newcommand} -->
\renewcommand*{\vec}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\providecommand{\trans}{^\mathsf{T}}
\providecommand*{\mat}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\providecommand*{\diag}[1]{\mathrm{diag}\, #1}
<!-- %\renewcommand*{\det}[1]{\mathrm{det} (#1)} -->
<!-- %\renewcommand*{\det}[1]{|#1|} -->
\renewcommand*{\det}[1]{\mathrm{det}(#1)}
\providecommand*{\rank}[1]{\mathrm{rank} (\mathbf{#1})}
\providecommand*{\trace}[1]{\mathrm{tr} (\mathbf{#1})}
\providecommand*{\dev}[1]{(#1 - \bar{#1})}
\providecommand*{\inv}[1]{\mat{#1}^{-1}}
\providecommand*{\half}[1]{\mat{#1}^{1/2}}
\providecommand*{\invhalf}[1]{\mat{#1}^{-1/2}}
\providecommand*{\nvec}[2]{{#1}_{1}, {#1}_{2},\ldots,{#1}_{#2}}
\providecommand*{\norm}[1]{\left \lVert #1 \right \rVert}
\providecommand{\Beta}{\boldsymbol{B}}
\providecommand{\Epsilon}{\boldsymbol{\Large\varepsilon}}
\providecommand{\period}{\:\: .}
\providecommand{\comma}{\:\: ,}
\providecommand{\given}{\, | \,}
\providecommand*{\Real}[1]{\mathbb{R}^{#1}}
\providecommand*{\degree}[1]{{#1}^{\circ}}
<!-- \providecommand{\sizedmat}[2]{\mathord{\mathop{\mat{#1}}\limits_{(#2)}}} -->
\providecommand{\sizedmat}[2]{\mathord{\mathop{\mat{#1}}\limits_{#2}}}

\renewcommand*{\H}{\mathbf{H}}               
\providecommand{\E}{\mathbf{E}}
\providecommand{\widebar}[1]{\overline{#1}}

\providecommand{\Var}{\mathsf{Var}}
\providecommand{\Cov}{\mathsf{Cov}}
\providecommand{\HO}{\mathcal{H}_0}

<!-- \newcommand*{\E}{\mathcal{E}} -->
\providecommand{\V}{\mathcal{V}}

<!-- Index generation -->
\providecommand{\IX}[1]{\index{#1}#1}
\providecommand{\ix}[1]{\index{#1}}
\providecommand{\ixmain}[1]{\index{#1|textbf}}

\providecommand{\ixon}[1]{\index{#1|(}}
\providecommand{\ixoff}[1]{\index{#1|)}}

<!-- % R packages:  indexed under both package name and packages! -->
\providecommand{\ixp}[1]{%
   \index{#1@\texttt{#1} package}%
   \index{packages!#1@\texttt{#1}}%
	}

<!-- % data sets:  -->
\providecommand{\ixd}[1]{%
        \index{data sets!#1}}


<!-- % R stuff -->
\providecommand{\pkg}[1]{\textsf{#1}}
\providecommand{\Rpackage}[1]{\pkg{#1} package}
